thread.section_title: The Inn At The Roman Forum - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Rome, Italy) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Inn at the roman forum
thread.title_full: Inn at the roman forum - Review of The Inn At The Roman Forum, Rome, Italy - TripAdvisor

author: Chris P
title: Inn at the roman forum
text:
Fantastic,friendly hotel in a great location. Staff were pleasant and couldn't be more helpful. We had an apartment in the annex but this wasn't a problem, it was well equipped and comfortable. Breakfast buffet was great , only drawback was it was at the top of the main hotel and when we went it was too cold to sit out on the roof terrace.
Great hotel to see the sights of Rome
